name: Special Forces: Kung Fu Commando
overview:
Special Forces (also known as Special Forces: Kung Fu Commando) was developed by Senko Industries and published by Magic Electronics in 1985.

Special Forces: Kung Fu Commando is a 2D side-scrolling shooter game. The player controls a black-bearded commando with characteristic mohawk, who assaults an embassy occupied by terrorists to rescue hostages. The commando has a gun with infinite ammunition, must eliminate various terrorist-opponents, and shoot deadly grenades that fly in his direction.
